Interface ICapeNumericFlowsheetFactory

 
IDL source    Global index
interface ICapeNumericFlowsheetFactory : ICapeUtilityParameter

This is the factory of Flowsheet model.

  • File = ICapeNumericSMST.idl
  • Date = June 99
  • Project = CAPE-OPEN BE 3512
Author:
CAPE-OPEN Partners
See Also:
CAPE-OPEN Web Site , Jean-Pierre Belaud, Inherited operations from ICapeUtilityParameter

  • CreateFlowsheet

    Creates a flowsheet which will be:
    an ICapeNumericProcessGraph interface if CapeFlowsheetType = PROCESS_GRAPH.
    an ICapeNumericPartitionGraph interface if CapeFlowsheetType = PARTITION_GRAPH.
    an ICapeNumericOpenPartitionGraph interface if CapeFlowsheetType = OPEN_PARTITION_GRAPH.

    Pre Conditions: An interface of the ICapeNumericFlowsheet hierarchy with the same name does not exist.

    Post Conditions: None.

  • Destroy

    Destroys the interface.
    The behaviour of this method is implementation dependent.

    Pre Conditions: None.

    Post Conditions: None.

  • GetName

    Gets the name of the interface

    Pre Conditions: None.

    Post Conditions: None.

  • CreateFlowsheet

      ICapeNumericFlowsheet CreateFlowsheet(in CapeFlowsheetType type,
      in CapeString name)
    raises(CapeBAD_PARAM, CapeUNKNOWN);

    Creates a flowsheet which will be:
    an ICapeNumericProcessGraph interface if CapeFlowsheetType = PROCESS_GRAPH.
    an ICapeNumericPartitionGraph interface if CapeFlowsheetType = PARTITION_GRAPH.
    an ICapeNumericOpenPartitionGraph interface if CapeFlowsheetType = OPEN_PARTITION_GRAPH.

    Pre Conditions: An interface of the ICapeNumericFlowsheet hierarchy with the same name does not exist.

    Post Conditions: None.

    Returns:
    the object reference of the created Interface.
    Parameters:
    type: Type of the created interface.
    name: Name of the created interface.
    Raises:
    CapeBAD_PARAM, CapeUNKNOWN
    See Also:
    ICapeNumericProcessGraph , ICapeNumericPartitionGraph , ICapeNumericOpenPartitionGraph

  • Destroy

      CapeBoolean Destroy()
    raises(CapeNO_IMPLEMENT, CapeUNKNOWN);

    Destroys the interface.
    The behaviour of this method is implementation dependent.

    Pre Conditions: None.

    Post Conditions: None.

    Returns:
    TRUE if the interface is destroyed, otherwise FALSE.
    Raises:
    CapeNO_IMPLEMENT, CapeUNKNOWN

      CapeString GetName()
    raises(CapeUNKNOWN);

    Gets the name of the interface

    Pre Conditions: None.

    Post Conditions: None.

    Returns:
    the name of the interface.
    Raises:
